site.name: Main Public Site
site.description: This site contains Early Greek Epic and the works of Shakespeare, Spenser and Chaucer. It is open to the world.

site.name: Nineteenth Century Fiction Site
site.description: This site contains 250 British novels from 1780 to 1900, plus the works of Shakespeare, Spenser and Chaucer. It is accessible only at Northwestern University.

site.name: Early Modern English Drama Site
site.description: This site contains approximately 330 Early Modern English plays, including all of Shakespeare. It also includes the works of Chaucer and Spenser. It is accessible only at Northwestern University and at other institutions that are subscribers to the Text Creation Partnership (TCP).
